column5: This thing is just nuts. The price is outlandish. And I can see some big fish getting its mouth around one of the blades and making it really tough to extract. But it seems to work. At 60USD I'll probably wait until I find one that someone snagged on a tree. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oZ4PAKmbvMs
It is a teaser lure that we use in saltwater fishing down here. Save the money and just buy a jitter bug it will work just as well and easier to remove from the fishes mouthÂ .  Art
